verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יוּשַׁ֥ר <WH7891> be sung הַשִּׁיר־ <WH7892> shall this song הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah עִ֣יר <WH5892> city עָז־ <WH5794> fierce לָ֔נוּ יְשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH3444> salvation יָשִׁ֖ית <WH7896> will [God] appoint חוֹמ֥וֹת <WH2346> [for] walls וָחֵֽל׃ <WH2426> and bulwarks

פִּתְח֖וּ <WH6605> Open שְׁעָרִ֑ים <WH8179> ye the gates וְיָבֹ֥א <WH935> may enter in גוֹי־ <WH1471> nation צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> that the righteous שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> which keepeth אֱמֻנִֽים׃ <WH529> the truth

יֵ֣צֶר <WH3336> [whose] mind סָמ֔וּךְ <WH5564> [is] stayed תִּצֹּ֖ר <WH5341> Thou wilt keep שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <WH7965> [him] in perfect שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> peace כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because בְךָ֖ בָּטֽוּחַ׃ <WH982> [on thee] because he trusteth

בִּטְח֥וּ <WH982> Trust בַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> ye in the LORD עֲדֵי־ <WH5704> against עַ֑ד <WH5703> for ever כִּ֚י <WH3588> in בְּיָ֣הּ <WH3050> for in the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> JEHOVAH צ֖וּר <WH6697> strength עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <WH5769> [is] everlasting

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הֵשַׁח֙ <WH7817> For he bringeth down יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> them that dwell מָר֔וֹם <WH4791> on high קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> city נִשְׂגָּבָ֑ה <WH7682> the lofty יַשְׁפִּילֶ֤נָּה <WH8213> he layeth it low יַשְׁפִּילָהּ֙ <WH8213> he layeth it low עַד־ <WH5704> against אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> [even] to the ground יַגִּיעֶ֖נָּה <WH5060> he bringeth עַד־ <WH5704> against עָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> it [even] to the dust
תִּרְמְסֶ֖נָּה <WH7429> shall tread it down רָ֑גֶל <WH7272> The foot רַגְלֵ֥י <WH7272> [even] the feet עָנִ֖י <WH6041> of the poor פַּעֲמֵ֥י <WH6471> [and] the steps דַלִּֽים׃ <WH1800> of the needy

אֹ֥רַח <WH734> The way לַצַּדִּ֖יק <WH6662> of the just מֵֽישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> [is] uprightness יָשָׁ֕ר <WH3477> thou most upright מַעְגַּ֥ל <WH4570> the path צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> of the just תְּפַלֵּֽס׃ <WH6424> dost weigh

אַ֣ף <WH637> Indeed אֹ֧רַח <WH734> Yea in the way מִשְׁפָּטֶ֛יךָ <WH4941> of thy judgments יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD קִוִּינ֑וּךָ <WH6960> have we waited לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> [is] to thy name וּֽלְזִכְרְךָ֖ <WH2143> and to the remembrance תַּאֲוַת־ <WH8378> for thee the desire נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> of [our] soul

נַפְשִׁ֤י <WH5315> With my soul אִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH183> have I desired בַּלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> thee in the night אַף־ <WH637> Indeed רוּחִ֥י <WH7307> yea with my spirit בְקִרְבִּ֖י <WH7130> within אֲשַֽׁחֲרֶ֑ךָּ <WH7836> me will I seek thee early כִּ֞י <WH3588> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> your מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH4941> for when thy judgments לָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> [are] in the earth צֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> righteousness לָמְד֖וּ <WH3925> will learn יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> of the world

יֻחַ֤ן <WH2603> Let favour be shewed רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> to the wicked בַּל־ <WH1077> [yet] will he not לָמַ֣ד <WH3925> learn צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteousness בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land נְכֹח֖וֹת <WH5229> of uprightness יְעַוֵּ֑ל <WH5765> will he deal unjustly וּבַל־ <WH1077> and will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> behold גֵּא֥וּת <WH1348> the majesty יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God ס

יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> LORD רָ֥מָה <WH7311> is lifted up יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> [when] thy hand בַּל־ <WH1077> not יֶחֱזָי֑וּן <WH2372> they will not see יֶחֱז֤וּ <WH2372> [but] they shall see וְיֵבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH954> and be ashamed קִנְאַת־ <WH7068> for [their] envy עָ֔ם <WH5971> at the people אַף־ <WH637> Indeed אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> yea the fire צָרֶ֥יךָ <WH6862> of thine enemies תֹאכְלֵֽם׃ <WH398> shall devour ס

יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> LORD תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ת <WH8239> thou wilt ordain שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace לָ֑נוּ כִּ֛י <WH3588> Since גַּ֥ם <WH1571> have also כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֖ינוּ <WH4639> all our works פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <WH6466> for us for thou also hast wrought לָּֽנוּ׃

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God בְּעָל֥וּנוּ <WH1166> thee have had dominion אֲדֹנִ֖ים <WH113> [other] lords זֽוּלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2108> beside לְבַד־ <WH905> alone בְּךָ֖ נַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> over us [but] by thee only will we make mention שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> of thy name

מֵתִים֙ <WH4191> [They are] dead בַּל־ <WH1077> will not יִחְי֔וּ <WH2421> they shall not live רְפָאִ֖ים <WH7496> [they are] deceased בַּל־ <WH1077> will not יָקֻ֑מוּ <WH6965> they shall not rise לָכֵ֤ן <WH3651> Therefore פָּקַ֙דְתָּ֙ <WH6485> therefore hast thou visited וַתַּשְׁמִידֵ֔ם <WH8045> and destroyed וַתְּאַבֵּ֥ד <WH6> to perish כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֵ֖כֶר <WH2143> them and made all their memory לָֽמוֹ׃

יָסַ֤פְתָּ <WH3254> Thou hast increased לַגּוֹי֙ <WH1471> the nation יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD יָסַ֥פְתָּ <WH3254> thou hast increased לַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> the nation נִכְבָּ֑דְתָּ <WH3513> thou art glorified רִחַ֖קְתָּ <WH7368> thou hadst removed [it] far כָּל־ <WH3605> all קַצְוֵי־ <WH7099> [unto] all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> LORD בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> in trouble פְּקָד֑וּךָ <WH6485> have they visited צָק֣וּן <WH6694> thee they poured out לַ֔חַשׁ <WH3908> a prayer מוּסָרְךָ֖ <WH4148> [when] thy chastening לָֽמוֹ׃

כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> Like הָרָה֙ <WH2030> as a woman with child תַּקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> [that] draweth near לָלֶ֔דֶת <WH3205> the time of her delivery תָּחִ֥יל <WH2342> is in pain תִּזְעַ֖ק <WH2199> [and] crieth out בַּחֲבָלֶ֑יהָ <WH2256> in her pangs כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> Thus הָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> thy מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> so have we been in thy sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

הָרִ֣ינוּ <WH2030> conceive חַ֔לְנוּ <WH2342> we have been in pain כְּמ֖וֹ <WH3644> we have as it were יָלַ֣דְנוּ <WH3205> brought forth ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> wind יְשׁוּעֹת֙ <WH3444> any deliverance בַּל־ <WH1077> neither נַ֣עֲשֶׂה <WH6213> we have not wrought אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּבַֽל־ <WH1077> Nor יִפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> fallen יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> have the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> of the world

יִֽחְי֣וּ <WH2421> [men] shall live מֵתֶ֔יךָ <WH4191> Thy dead נְבֵלָתִ֖י <WH5038> [together with] my dead body יְקוּמ֑וּן <WH6965> shall they arise הָקִ֨יצוּ <WH6974> Awake וְרַנְּנ֜וּ <WH7442> and sing שֹׁכְנֵ֣י <WH7931> ye that dwell עָפָ֗ר <WH6083> in dust כִּ֣י <WH3588> For טַ֤ל <WH2919> for thy dew אוֹרֹת֙ <WH219> of herbs טַלֶּ֔ךָ <WH2919> [is as] the dew וָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth רְפָאִ֥ים <WH7496> the dead תַּפִּֽיל׃ <WH5307> shall cast out ס

לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> Come עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people בֹּ֣א <WH935> enter בַחֲדָרֶ֔יךָ <WH2315> thou into thy chambers וּֽסְגֹ֥ר <WH5462> and shut [דְּלָתֶיךָ כ] (דְּלָתְךָ֖ <WH1817> door ק) בַּעֲדֶ֑ךָ <WH1157> behind חֲבִ֥י <WH2247> about thee hide כִמְעַט־ <WH4592> thyself as it were for a little רֶ֖גַע <WH7281> moment עַד־ <WH5704> Until [יַעֲבֹור כ] (יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> runs זָֽעַם׃ <WH5674> be overpast ק)

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For behold the LORD יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> cometh out מִמְּקוֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> of his place לִפְקֹ֛ד <WH6485> to punish עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> for their iniquity יֹֽשֵׁב־ <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְגִלְּתָ֤ה <WH1540> also shall disclose הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the earth אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמֶ֔יהָ <WH1818> her blood וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and will no תְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> and shall no more cover ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer עַל־ <WH5921> and הֲרוּגֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2026> her slain ס
